title: (x) Vitra Home Collection catalog cover 70s serif face - ITC Grouch {Akira}
content:
hi,

does anybody know what this font could be?

just can't find it out... \*grr\*

( cover serif font vitra home collection catalog )

thanks!

peter

comments.content:
You’re welcome.

But I’m afraid I must say it is unavailable now.

FYI: [http://www.typophile.com/node/16331](http://web.archive.org/web/20111228172633/http:/www.typophile.com/node/16331 "http://www.typophile.com/node/16331")

uhm...

thats a shame...

its a nice one!
Grouch is available in Corel Draw 7
